original: ** ORIGINAL ZE BLACKMESA BY BILL SMAUTZ **
zh_trans: ** 原作:ZE BLACKMESA,作者:BILL SMAUTZ **

original: ** REDESIGN BY CISNEROS **
zh_trans: ** 改编:CISNEROS **

original: *** 变动:无，无聊的正常模式! ***
zh_trans: *** 变动:无，无聊的正常模式! ***

original: *** It seems as if there was going to ocurr a big earthquake... ***
zh_trans: *** 似乎即将发生一场大地震... ***

original: *** 变动:登上电车吧——没有桥/秘密通道 ***
zh_trans: *** 变动:登上电车吧——没有桥/秘密通道 ***

original: *** Bridge Activated ***
zh_trans: *** 桥梁已激活 ***

original: *** 歼灭模式启用:怪物实验室, 开放(32个人类及以上，额外激活1-2个怪物) ***
zh_trans: *** 歼灭模式启用:怪物实验室, 开放(32个人类及以上，额外激活1-2个怪物) ***

original: *** 堡垒回合:存活5分钟! ***
*** 冰冻枪已被拿起，按E使用，cd:60秒 ***
zh_trans: *** 冰冻枪已被拿起，按E使用，cd:60秒 ***

original: *** Ventilation area protections unlock in 10 seconds ***
zh_trans: *** 通风区保护将在10秒后解锁 ***

original: *** 地雷已被拿起，按E使用，仅能放置4个地雷 ***
zh_trans: *** 地雷已被拿起，按E使用，仅能放置4个地雷 ***

original: *** Two minutes left! Stay alive!!! ***
** 弹药箱已被拿起，按E使用，cd:90秒 **
zh_trans: ** 弹药箱已被拿起，按E使用，cd:90秒 **

original: *** 有人找到了迷幻药并获得了急速。但毒品是害的，对吧?（加速已被拿起，固定加速25%） ***
zh_trans: *** 有人找到了迷幻药并获得了急速。但毒品是害的，对吧?（加速已被拿起，固定加速25%） ***

original: *** Just one minute! RESIST!!! ***
*** 30 seconds to go! C'mon! ***
*** 毁灭僵尸的细菌将在15秒内释放! ***
zh_trans: *** 毁灭僵尸的细菌将在15秒内释放! ***

original: *** YEAH!!! WE DID IT!!! ***
zh_trans: *** 是的！我们成功了！ ***

original: *** Tram Starts in 7 Seconds ***
zh_trans: *** 电车将在7秒钟后启动 ***

original: *** Security Door Closes in 5 Seconds ***
zh_trans: *** 安全门将在5秒钟后关闭 ***

original: *** Airlock Opens in 12 Seconds ***
zh_trans: *** 气闸将在12秒钟后打开 ***

original: *** Sector L door opens in 30 seconds ***
zh_trans: *** L区门将在30秒后打开 ***

original: *** Sector L door opens in 10 seconds ***
zh_trans: *** L区门将在10秒后打开 ***

original: *** This cave has collapsed... Maybe another earthquake could help? ***
zh_trans: ***这个洞穴已经坍塌了...也许另一次地震会有所帮助？***

original: *** Resist 15 seconds! ***
*** Resist 5 seconds! There's some shaking going on! ***
zh_trans: ***抵抗5秒！这里正在发生晃动！***

original: *** 推力抢已经被拿起，按e使用，cd:60秒. ***
zh_trans: *** 推力抢已经被拿起，按e使用，cd:60秒. ***

original: *** Resist here for 15 seconds! This area used to lead to an abandoned mine!***
zh_trans: *** 在这里坚持15秒！这个区域曾经通往一个废弃的矿井！***

original: *** Defend that natural bridge! The seismometer reads a new earthquake soon!!! ***
zh_trans: *** 保卫那座天然的桥！地震测量仪显示很快会有新的地震发生！***

original: *** Keep defending! We have to resist until the whole bridge is destroyed! ***
zh_trans: *** 继续防守！我们必须坚持到整座桥被摧毁！***

original: *** Keep it! 30 seconds until the next earthquake!! ***
zh_trans: *** 坚持住！还有30秒就会发生下一次地震！！ ***

original: *** C'mon!!! Just 5 seconds! ***
*** We have to get to a safe zone now! The nuke will make this area collapse! ***
zh_trans: *** 现在我们必须前往安全区域！核弹会让这个区域坍塌！ ***

original: *** Go to the small cave up there! Its walls are built off granite! ***
zh_trans: *** 到那边的小洞穴去！它的墙壁是由花岗岩建造的！ ***

original: *** 变动:突破到另一边——没有电车和前路锁定 ***
zh_trans: *** 变动:突破到另一边——没有电车和前路锁定 ***

original: *** First sector G door opens in 30 seconds ***
zh_trans: *** G区第一个门将在30秒后打开 ***

original: *** First sector G door opens in 10 seconds ***
zh_trans: *** G区第一个门将在10秒后打开 ***

original: *** Second sector G door opens in 25 seconds ***
zh_trans: *** G区第二个门将在25秒后打开 ***

original: *** Second sector G door opens in 10 seconds ***
zh_trans: *** G区第二个门将在10秒后打开 ***

original: *** 电梯20秒后离开 ***
zh_trans: *** 电梯20秒后离开 ***

original: *** 警告:主发电机过载 ***
zh_trans: *** 警告:主发电机过载 ***

original: *** 错误:冷却系统无法启动. ***
zh_trans: *** 错误:冷却系统无法启动. ***

original: *** 注意:紧急模式启动.门在1分钟内打开. ***
zh_trans: *** 注意:紧急模式启动.门在60秒内打开. ***

original: *** Safety underground bunker opens in 30 Seconds ***
zh_trans: ***地下安全防空洞将在30秒后开启***

original: *** Safety underground bunker opens in 10 Seconds ***
zh_trans: ***地下安全防空洞将在10秒后开启***

original: *** Safety underground bunker opens in 5 Seconds ***
zh_trans: ***地下安全防空洞将在5秒后开启***

original: *** Safety underground bunker is opening ***
zh_trans: *** 地下安全防空洞正在开启 ***

original: *** WARNING: Facility detonation in 30 Seconds ***
zh_trans: ***警告：设施将在30秒内爆炸***

original: *** Safety underground bunker closes in 10 Seconds ***
zh_trans: ***地下安全防空洞将在10秒后关闭***

original: *** 变动:散漫的吉米——低重力激活 ***
zh_trans: *** 变动:散漫的吉米——低重力激活 ***

original: *** 变动:登上电车吧——没有前路/秘密通道 ***
zh_trans: *** 变动:登上电车吧——没有前路/秘密通道 ***

original: *** 变动:奇怪的空间情况——走另一边/没有秘密通道/低重力 ***
zh_trans: *** 变动:奇怪的空间情况——走另一边/没有秘密通道/低重力 ***

original: *** 变动:窥探秘密是不礼貌的——被锁住的秘密通道？ ***
zh_trans: *** 变动:窥探秘密是不礼貌的——被锁住的秘密通道？ ***

original: *** Sector P door opens in 20 seconds ***
zh_trans: *** 区域P的门将在20秒后打开 ***

original: *** Sector P door opens in 5 seconds ***
zh_trans: *** 区域P的门将在5秒后打开 ***

original: *** Sewage system door opens in 35 seconds. ***
zh_trans: ***下水道系统的门将在35秒后打开。***

original: *** Sewage system door opens in 15 seconds. ***
zh_trans: ***下水道系统的门将在15秒后打开。***

original: *** Sewage system door opens in 5 seconds. ***
zh_trans: ***下水道系统的门将在5秒后打开。***

original: *** Maintenance area door opens in 25 seconds. ***
zh_trans: ***维护区的门将在25秒后打开。***

original: *** Maintenance area door opens in 10 seconds. ***
zh_trans: ***维护区的门将在10秒后打开。***

original: *** Ventilation lockers open in 25 seconds. ***
zh_trans: ***通风储物柜将在25秒后打开。***

original: *** Ventilation lockers open in 10 seconds. ***
zh_trans: ***通风储物柜将在10秒后打开。***

original: *** GO! We have to get to the Escape elevator!!! ***
zh_trans: ***快点！我们必须赶到逃生电梯！！！***

original: *** Elevator leaves in 20 seconds!!! ***
zh_trans: *** 电梯20秒后离开 ***

original: *** Elevator leaves in 10 seconds!!! ***
zh_trans: *** 电梯10秒后离开 ***

original: *** Airlock Closing in 8 Seconds ***
zh_trans: *** 气闸将在8秒内关闭。 ***

original: *** Helicopter Departing in 30 Seconds ***
zh_trans: *** 直升机将在30秒后起飞 ***

original: *** Helicopter Departing in 10 Seconds ***
zh_trans: *** 直升机将在10秒后起飞 ***

original: *** Helicopter Departing in 5 Seconds ***
zh_trans: *** 直升机将在5秒后起飞 ***

original: *** Helicopter is Departing ***
zh_trans: *** 直升机正在离开 ***

original: *** WARNING: Facility detonation in 40 Seconds ***
zh_trans: *** 警告:设施将在40秒后爆炸 ***

original: *** 尖刺炸弹已被拿起，按E使用，仅能用一次 ***
*** 减速电环已被拿起，按E使用，cd:45秒 ***
** 喷火器已被拿起，按E使用，再按E关闭，仅能使用10秒 **
